record.description: Cutaway drawings of the Experimental Breeder Reactor II, which will be the first completely, integrated power reactor system operating on a closed fuel cycle when it is completed in 1960. Argonne National Laboratory will have an EBR-II exhibit at the Second International Conference on the Peaceful Uses of Atomic Energy, Geneva, Switzerland September 1-13. EBR-II is called a completely integrated reactor system because it has a fuel reprocessing and refabrication facility in addition to a reactor, heat transfer systems, and steam-electric plant.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
